label: Arrogant
description: Inflates self‑worth and discounts others, provoking resistance and blinding strategy; disastrous in leadership and a straight path to hubristic downfall.

label: Cowardly
description: Avoids danger at any cost, undermining trust and forcing others to carry risk; acute internal conflict when love or duty demands courage.

label: Reckless
description: Acts without weighing consequences, producing pyrrhic wins and needless losses; escalates external conflict unnecessarily.

label: Manipulative
description: Engineers outcomes by exploiting people; useful in intrigue yet corrodes relationships and reputation, and invites retaliation.

label: Vindictive
description: Pursues payback at the expense of all else, warping motivation and endangering allies; trajectory leans tragic unless forgiveness intervenes.

label: Jealous
description: Fears loss of affection or status, breeding sabotage and deceit; often triggered by secrets and inflamed by shifting reputations.

label: Deceitful
description: Habitually lies, fracturing trust; advantageous in covert roles but lethal to cohesion when revealed.

label: Greedy
description: Overvalues acquisition, compromising ethics and alliances; external conflicts over resources intensify while inner emptiness persists.

label: Dogmatic
description: Clings to doctrine despite evidence, producing brittle decisions; collides with open‑minded teammates and adaptive strategy.

label: Intemperate
description: Lacks moderation (anger, lust, spending), inviting scandal and blackmail; easily exploited by adversaries.

label: Impulsive
description: Jumps to action on emotion, bypassing planning; occasional brilliance but frequent collateral damage.

label: Pessimistic
description: Expects the worst, sapping morale and missing opportunities; can become a self‑fulfilling filter.

label: Perfectionist
description: Sets unattainable standards that stall progress and erode teams; toxic when paired with creator/engineer roles.

label: Callous
description: Numbs empathy, enabling cruelty or neglect; effective in brutal settings but reputationally radioactive.

label: Hypocritical
description: Preaches values they won’t practice; credibility detonates when secrets surface—devastating for moral authorities.

label: Envious
description: Covets others’ success, turning collaboration into rivalry; may spur growth but often curdles into sabotage.

label: Naïve
description: Misreads danger and manipulation, risking self and group; transitional flaw for coming‑of‑age arcs.

label: Apathetic
description: Lacks concern or motivation, stalling plots until external pressure forces movement; corrosive to teams.

label: Cynical
description: Assumes bad faith, poisoning trust; sometimes sharpens analysis, often blocks alliances crucial to victory.

label: Stubborn
description: Refuses to shift stance despite new data; steady under fire but brittle when wrong, endangering outcomes.

label: Overbearing
description: Dominates and micromanages, suffocating initiative; especially harmful in leadership roles.

label: Paranoid
description: Sees threats everywhere, creating self‑fulfilling betrayals; espionage arcs intensify this flaw.

label: Vain
description: Seeks admiration over substance, misallocating effort and exposing to manipulation; reputation obsession eclipses stakes.

label: Indecisive
description: Delays commitment, missing windows of opportunity; breeds frustration in crises.

label: Ruthless
description: Discards ethics to achieve goals; effective against monsters and tyrants at severe cost to soul and team.

label: Gullible
description: Over‑trusts appearances, becoming a gateway for antagonist plots; crippling for investigators.

label: Spiteful
description: Harms others even at own cost; escalates petty wars that distract from main conflicts.

label: Obsessive
description: Fixates on one aim, corroding health and relationships; can deliver breakthroughs at catastrophic price.

label: Miserly
description: Hoarder of resources, eroding goodwill and resilience; backfires in crises requiring mutual aid.

label: Bigoted
description: Devalues groups by identity, destroying alliances and legitimacy; opposition will organize against it.

label: Fanatical
description: Pursues belief with absolute zeal, immune to compromise; powerful in movements but prone to atrocity.

label: Lazy
description: Avoids exertion, shifting burdens to others; untenable in high‑stakes arcs and forces reckonings.

label: Masochistic
description: Seeks or tolerates suffering, confusing loyalty with self‑harm; invites exploitation by antagonists.

label: Martinet
description: Enforces rules without judgment, crushing morale; brittle in fluid battlefields and negotiations.

label: Petty
description: Fixates on small slights, derailing strategy over trivialities; reputationally corrosive.

label: Resentful
description: Nurtures grudges that warp teamwork; easily weaponized by savvy antagonists.

label: Secretive
description: Withholds information reflexively, even when trust would serve; amplifies paranoia and fractures teams.

label: Short‑tempered
description: Flashes to anger, turning sparks into fires; highly exploitable via provocation.

label: Superstitious
description: Misattributes causes and seeks magical fixes, sabotaging rational plans; manipulable by charlatans.

label: Two‑faced
description: Performs different selves for different audiences beyond healthy code‑switching; exposure destroys reputation.

label: Wasteful
description: Burns resources imprudently, weakening long‑term position; often paired with vanity or impulsiveness.

label: Withdrawn
description: Retreats from engagement, starving teams of input and bonding; sometimes a trauma shield that must be healed.

label: Workaholic
description: Overworks to avoid feelings, eroding judgment and relationships; appears virtuous until collapse.

label: Anxious
description: Anticipates catastrophe, impairing performance; sharpens preparation only when channeled.

label: Cruel
description: Inflicts pain for control or amusement; cements villain status and forecloses redemption arcs.

label: Delusional
description: Clings to false beliefs, becoming dangerous and unpredictable; secrets and reputations destabilize around them.

label: Dishonorable
description: Breaks oaths lightly, destroying legitimacy; social death in oath‑bound cultures.

label: Egotistical
description: Centers self in all narratives; impossible collaborator unless humbled by events.

label: Fickle
description: Shifts allegiance or taste rapidly, creating chaos; unreliable in critical arcs.

label: Gloomy
description: Radiates despair that demoralizes allies; occasionally accurate in horror, usually harmful to cohesion.

label: Hard‑hearted
description: Rejects appeals to mercy, making negotiations brittle; simplifies choices at the cost of humanity.

label: Hot‑headed
description: Rushes into fights, predictable and provokable; handy for enemies to bait.

label: Hypercritical
description: Nitpicks and demeans, stifling creativity; undermines creators and innovators.

label: Ignorant
description: Lacks essential knowledge and resists learning; survivable if humble, deadly if proud.

label: Impish
description: Mischief without wisdom, burning bridges for laughs; fun at low stakes, fatal at high.

label: Inflexible
description: Cannot adapt, breaking under novelty; defeats even brilliant strategies from the inside.

label: Insensitive
description: Misses emotional cues, harming relationships; fixable with awareness, damaging when denied.

label: Intolerant
description: Cannot abide difference; collapses coalitions and invites righteous opposition.

label: Irresponsible
description: Evades accountability, breeding chaos; adversaries exploit the blame vacuum.

label: Melodramatic
description: Inflates events for attention, distracting from substance; reputationally undermining.

label: Negligent
description: Fails duties through inattention; devastating in guardian/healer roles.

label: Prideful
description: Rejects help and feedback; the classical path to downfall absent humility.

label: Reclusive
description: Hides from community, starving self of support; sometimes necessary in fugitive arcs, often isolating.

label: Sanctimonious
description: Flaunts moral superiority; alienates allies and invites tests that expose hypocrisy.

label: Self‑pitying
description: Fixates on own suffering; drains teams and stalls growth until reframed.

label: Scheming
description: Plots constantly, treating people as pieces; brilliant in court politics, ruinous for trust.

label: Suspicious
description: Assumes ulterior motives, blocking coalition; prudent in espionage, corrosive elsewhere.

label: Thuggish
description: Uses intimidation by default; effective short‑term, strategic dead‑end long‑term.

label: Waste‑averse
description: Hoarding to a fault, missing opportunities that require investment; equal and opposite failure to wastefulness.
